name: Dan Harmon's Story Circle
description: Character psychology-focused structure based on simplified hero's journey. Emphasizes internal transformation through external adventure
distribution_philosophy: Equal emphasis on psychological states with character need driving each transition

comfort_zone.name: You (Comfort Zone)
comfort_zone.description: Character in familiar situation but lacking something

want_something.name: Need (Want Something)
want_something.description: Character becomes aware of what they lack

enter_unfamiliar.name: Go (Enter Unfamiliar Situation)
enter_unfamiliar.description: Character leaves comfort zone to pursue their need

struggle_adapt.name: Search (Struggle to Adapt)
struggle_adapt.description: Character faces obstacles in the unfamiliar situation

find_what_wanted.name: Find (Discover What You Actually Needed)
find_what_wanted.description: Character discovers the true nature of what they needed

pay_heavy_price.name: Take (Pay a Heavy Price)
pay_heavy_price.description: Character must sacrifice something important to gain what they need

return_home.name: Return (Come Back Changed)
return_home.description: Character returns to familiar world but transformed

change_world.name: Change (Transform Your World)
change_world.description: Character's transformation impacts their original environment
